Yes, I‚Äôve heard that many times before, and thank you for the hug and your support, I feel you :D

The thing is, though.. I can‚Äôt. I can‚Äôt keep living in a world where I don‚Äôt exist or matter to anybody. Where I‚Äôm oblivious and naive and nothing I do has any effect. Where all the things that matter to me matter to no one else.

I‚Äôm very strongly introverted but also very creative and caring. To get a really good idea of what I‚Äôm like, check out Psych2Go on youtube: their video ‚Äú12 Things Introverts Are Best At Doing.‚Äù Anyways, I‚Äôm a really empathetic person but I‚Äôm helpless.

I‚Äôm turning 16 soon and I‚Äôm getting worse at school. Depression and derealization slowly destroy my world and my lack of any love or empathy in my life makes me feel unimportant. When I look in the mirror I‚Äôm disgusted at the creature looking back. I recognize my talents and my great personality but there is some part of me deep down that hates me, and the only way I can overcome that is for someone to show me love.

I can‚Äôt stop searching for love because it‚Äôs the only thing that can save me, if that makes any sense. As a matter of fact, the hope that maybe some miracle will happen and I will have love is one of two reasons I haven‚Äôt killed myself.

Not entirely true.. I‚Äôm turning sixteen in a month and I have  serious chronic depression.. it has gotten to the point where I am on track to fail ALL of my classes despite being a straight A student for almost every year of formal school.. I have no friends as I find friends exhausting and have feelings for a crush who I have already confessed my feelings towards and every time I see her a small part of me hurts so bad inside..

But anyway: the point is that I HAVE thought about what I want to be as an adult - a musician and an inventor.. I want to CREATE. That‚Äôs the kind of person I am. I want to be a software/hardware developer and a musician. The problem with depression is I know I won‚Äôt get there because if I don‚Äôt even make it through high school I‚Äôm screwed

Hey that is NOT OKAY what your parents do.. that is direct physical and verbal abuse at an extreme level and is actually ILLEGAL.. I don‚Äôt know what you could do about it to avoid getting hurt.. BUT I think you should talk to someone at your school like a counselor or something and just tell them your situation and make sure they keep it a secret until they can ensure you are safe. YOUR PARENTS ARE TERRIBLE PEOPLE!! And you are not that.. YOU ARE AN AMAZING PERSON!! ..really.. I mean being able to deal with them and still know kindness in your heart speaks wonders about you as a person.. and if you read this please know that your parents have been LYING to you about your worth.. they wouldn‚Äôt know a gift like you if it beat them down (just like they beat you).. so KEEP GOING because you are SO MUCH BETTER than any of the psychos, abusers, and others in your life make you feel.. I‚Äôm not entirely sure.. but part of it is that I know it will hurt.. I KNOW that some part of me will fight back, and I don‚Äôt have the strength to keep it subdued.. I know it will win. It‚Äôs almost like I‚Äôm scared of being scared of death itself..

And then the other part is that.. whenever I‚Äôm there.. whenever I have the way out, and all I have to do is continue onward.. I suddenly feel lonely. Suddenly the only thing that matters is turning to see a loved one, someone who truly cares.. and then part of me BELIEVES that there CAN BE that person there.. so I stop killing myself -

- and I‚Äôm completely alone.

And I want to die.

Here is something that I found helps. I don‚Äôt know if it will help you.
Instead of setting goals that have something to do with your life, set emotional goals.. like ‚ÄúI will pay more attention to sadness in my mind‚Äù or ‚ÄúI will appreciate myself when I shower in the morning‚Äù and that kind of thing.
Yeah, good luck to both of us
I‚Äôm not really in any position to give advice, but maybe try connecting with your family.. that might make you feel better? I hope things start to look up for you :)
